statements: SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE ingredient_id = 1
SELECT substitution_name FROM ingredient_substitutions
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC
SELECT ingredient_id, substitution_name FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE substitution_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE substitution_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT ingredient_id, substitution_description FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE ingredient_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT substitution_name, substitution_description FROM ingredient_substitutions ORDER BY substitution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE substitution_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT substitution_name FROM ingredient_substitutions;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions;
SELECT original_ingredient, substitution_reason FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE substitution_id = 1;
SELECT substitution_id, original_ingredient, substituted_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions ORDER BY original_ingredient DESC;
SELECT variation_name, ingredients_list FROM recipe_variations WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT variation_id, variation_name, steps_description FROM recipe_variations ORDER BY variation_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE substitution_id = 1;
SELECT original_ingredient, substituted_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE substitution_reason LIKE '%allergy%';
SELECT substitution_id, original_ingredient, substituted_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE original_ingredient = 'Milk' ORDER BY substitution_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT original_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions;
SELECT variation_id, recipe_id, variation_name FROM recipe_variations WHERE ingredients_list LIKE '%cheese%' ORDER BY variation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions LIMIT 5;
SELECT original_ingredient, substitute_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE id < 10;
SELECT id, original_ingredient, notes FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE original_ingredient LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM recipe_variations ORDER BY variation_name DESC;
SELECT id, recipe_id, variation_name FROM recipe_variations WHERE recipe_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT original_ingredient, substitute_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE original_ingredient = 'flour';
SELECT * FROM recipe_variations WHERE recipe_id = 5 ORDER BY variation_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ingredient_usage GROUP BY recipe_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE notes LIKE '%gluten-free%';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient;
SELECT name, category FROM Ingredient ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Recipe_Ingredient WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE description LIKE '%delicious%';
SELECT r.name AS recipe_name, i.name AS ingredient_name FROM Recipe r JOIN Recipe_Ingredient ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id JOIN Ingredient i ON ri.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM Ingredient ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recipe_id, name, description FROM Recipe WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY recipe_id;

SELECT Recipe.name, Ingredient.name, quantity FROM Recipe JOIN Recipe_Ingredient ON Recipe.recipe_id = Recipe_Ingredient.recipe_id JOIN Ingredient ON Recipe_Ingredient.ingredient_id = Ingredient.ingredient_id WHERE Recipe.name LIKE '%pasta%' AND Ingredient.category = 'Sauce';

SELECT r.name AS Recipe_Name, i.name AS Ingredient_Name, r.description AS Recipe_Description FROM Recipe r JOIN Recipe_Ingredient ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id JOIN Ingredient i ON ri.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE ri.quantity >= 2 ORDER BY r.name, i.name;

SELECT s.substitution_id, i_original.name AS Original_Ingredient, i_substitute.name AS Substitute_Ingredient FROM Substitution s JOIN Ingredient i_original ON s.original_ingredient_id = i_original.ingredient_id JOIN Ingredient i_substitute ON s.substitute_ingredient_id = i_substitute.ingredient_id ORDER BY s.substitution_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions;
SELECT original_ingredient, substituted_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_id, property_name, property_value FROM ingredient_properties ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS num_ingredients FROM recipe_ingredients GROUP BY recipe_id HAVING num_ingredients > 3;
SELECT allergen_name, original_ingredient FROM ingredient_substitutions JOIN ingredient_allergens ON ingredient_substitutions.id = ingredient_allergens.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_substitutions WHERE original_ingredient = 'Flour';
SELECT id, variation_name FROM recipe_variations WHERE recipe_id = 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM recipe_ingredients GROUP BY recipe_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT ip.property_name, ip.property_value, ii.quantity, ii.unit_of_measurement FROM ingredient_properties ip JOIN recipe_ingredients ii ON ip.ingredient_id = ii.ingredient_id;

SELECT ia.allergen_name, ia.ingredient_id, is.original_ingredient, is.substituted_ingredient FROM ingredient_allergens ia JOIN ingredient_substitutions is ON ia.ingredient_id = is.id ORDER BY ia.ingredient_id ASC;
